title: People be like i shouldn't be a ww main because i never played him before
body:
During the season 4 he was one of the champs that i loved to play with the most 
however when i started buying other champs and trying them i discovered how old and boring  ww is but i still loved his '' wolf chase and kill identity ''  but someone told me that he is schduled for a rework , so i wanted to wait untill the rework to play him again
nothing pretty match changed in his kit , they just modernized him , the only thing that really changed is his E .
now people be like '' you don't deserve to main him because you never played or liked this champ ''

replies.body: What does liking the previous version of a champ have to do with maining it after rework it doesn't matter

The moment you start caring what people online think is the moment you start your way towards toxicity.
If you have a need to imerse yourself make sure it's constructive in some way for your benefit.
Why do you care what people think?
